SEARCH
Module com.example.quizCoach
Package com.example.quizCoach.database

Interface IQuizDAO

All Known Implementing Classes:
MockQuizDAO, SqliteQuizDAO
public interface IQuizDAO
Interface for the Quiz Data Access Object that handles the CRUD operations for the Quiz class with the database.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description

    addQuiz(Quiz quiz)
    Adds a new Quiz to the database.

    Deletes a Quiz from the database.

    Retrieves all Quizs from the database.

    Retrieves a Quiz from the database.

  • Method Details

    • addQuiz

      void addQuiz(Quiz quiz)
      Adds a new Quiz to the database.
      Parameters:
      quiz - The Quiz to add.

    • updateQuiz

      void updateQuiz(Quiz quiz)
      Updates an existing Quiz in the database.
      Parameters:
      quiz - The Quiz to update.

    • deleteQuiz

      void deleteQuiz(Quiz quiz)
      Deletes a Quiz from the database.
      Parameters:
      quiz - The Quiz to delete.

    • getQuiz

      Quiz getQuiz(int id)
      Retrieves a Quiz from the database.
      Parameters:
      id - The id of the Quiz to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The Quiz with the given id, or null if not found.

    • getAllQuizzes

      List<Quiz> getAllQuizzes()
      Retrieves all Quizs from the database.
      Returns:
      A list of all Quizs in the database.
